Your perspective on anger‚Äîwishing it were more deliberate and under control‚Äîmakes a lot of sense. Anger is supposed to be a tool, like any other emotion, but many people lose the ability to regulate it, especially when they‚Äôre overwhelmed or stuck in unhealthy environments.
